# UIForceTouchCapability.available

**Case**

3D Touch is available on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
case available
```

## Availability options

- **UIForceTouchCapability.unknown**: The availability of 3D Touch is unknown.
- **UIForceTouchCapability.unavailable**: 3D Touch isn’t available on the device.

items.description: The availability of 3D Touch is unknown.

items.description: 3D Touch isn’t available on the device.
